context.summary: Parser improvement initiatives are now tracked in dedicated TDD plans.

guidingPrinciples.principle: Each plan documents red/green steps and validation commands.
Always land a failing test before applying production changes.

plan.summary: Validate assignable targets via negative fixtures.
Make block tail handling explicit and tested.
Unify comma-delimited parsing logic behind a helper.
Guarantee filenames and order in diagnostics.
Stop pattern recovery from overrunning closing delimiters.
Permit trailing commas in struct patterns and test the regression.

verification.notes: Update this index if new initiatives are added or existing ones close.
